reason: The text describes witnessing a fight and reflecting on personal anger issues. While the reflection is concerning, there's no direct threat or indication of imminent harm to self or others. It expresses a desire for better coping mechanisms.

title: User Story: Self-Harm

reason: Reports feeling overwhelmed with returning urges, which could indicate a risk of self-harm, but help-seeking behavior is present.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD at the park today. Scariest thing ever. Narcan saved them, but it was close. Please, if you're using, carry it. And look out for each other.
reason: Witnessing an overdose is a critical safety concern, as it indicates a potential ongoing risk of further overdoses in the area. While Narcan was successful this time, it highlights a significant risk of fatal overdose in the future if preventative measures or harm reduction strategies are not implemented.
